phrases: dou ka please can you keep my se cret?
mu ga mu chuu da that is all right
Please, please can you keep my secret?
I wonder how do I look in it.
What will happen from now, I wonder?
Because what we see is not everything.
I am losing myself but that is all right.
I will now try not to waver.
I want to be true to my heart.
But even I have a secret or two.
That I want to keep to myself.
That is why my secret makes my heart aches slightly.
Everything that is reflected by your eyes,
is it all just an illusion?
as you melt away in this entangling love
Take a look at the reason we are joined together
Let us cling on to each other from our sadness
Is not it fine just like that?
It will be an unadorned beauty
That no matter where we are,
The male students' image of Prez
Even the girls at the school we played practice match with fell for him...
Wants to say a lot of things...
Given to all members in the club
You are really sly Ayuzawa, Usui you idiot!
You are really sly Ayuzawa, Usui you idiot!
Why did you tell everyone that you did not want them to come?
You actually wanted them to see you off, did not you?
Do not make that face anymore!
Morning arrives, and school's over in a blink of an eye.
She is as scary as always.
That is because he was having lunch in class before break.
She even scolded him before the teacher could do so.
Shintani, why are you having lunch now?!
And it is only first period!
Hinata, are not you afraid of getting scolded by her?
Did the sports clubs make this mess?
I told them many times not to track mud inside...
She is communicating with the devil!
Sheesh, cleaning this up sure is back-breaking!
She will bring you to hell if you get caught!
Why did you choose the Prez out of all the girls?
She might have been kinder back then, but look at her now.
Are there any bad boys lurking around?
She does talk a little differently compared to back then, but...
She is still as kind as she was!
I am confiscating these bread crusts!
Do not tell me she treats me differently?
That is what I thought, too!
My feelings for her will not change.
I realized a long time ago that she has to be the one for me.
What are you doing up there?
You are going to get your new uniform dirty!
There are a lot of people in my class.
I hope you can make a lot of friends.
You are already in middle school...
I am glad he grew up well.
I worried about him everyday after he came here.
He was plump back then, but he slimmed down a lot.
That is'because you only gave me veggies!
You were the one who did not want the meat!
You said it is fine, though you did not look fine.
I am glad things turned out well.
You got faster, did not you?
And you do not look all that muscular, either!
He is the ace, so of course he would be popular.
I am so jealous of him!
They are going to perform in Yumesaki High's Cultural Festival!
Have you forgotten how awful he was to you?
Please tell her she cannot go, Misaki!
He supposedly got injured in his last performance,
and changed his attitude when she visited him.
He has really changed, and I wanted you two to know...
Guess I have to go, then...
I want to go Yumesaki High's Cultural Festival!
Let the crystal ball reveal your future with her!
She is a fitting fortune-teller, but she still lacks some moe points.
She is moves as if she is possessed by something.
I cannot see anything, since it is as cloudy as gray matter.
That is everything you need to know!
I do not give a damn!
Which means it will never happen for you guys!
That is what the crystal ball says.
You do not need to put it so bluntly!
Since fortune-telling is basically just observing people, Misa would not be able to do it.
You do not even know about your own feelings.
Misaki-chan- Oops, it is Misa-chan here.
I guess I do not come enough to remember to call you that.
No, you are already a regular.
Oh yeah, I saw outside that there is fortune-telling today.
Please sit in front of the crystall ball, master!
Please tell me my future with Misa-chan!
His future with Misa-chan's like a deflated paper balloon, eh?
Must be worse than our cloudy prediction!
Trying to hang on to your last thread, eh?
I do not see any holes in it.
I can just inflate it again as long as there are no holes!
That is quite optimistic of him.
Here is something extra for you.
That optimism might just turn things around for you in the end.
If that is the case, I will get my future with Misa-chan told as well.
Is it me, or am I seeing dogs?
Then, I shall look into your future.
She is totally averting her eyes from the crystal ball!
Just tell it to me straight.
I see fire and water in the crystal ball.
You two are very incompatible, and a romance between the two of you cannot happen.
If you still wish to pursue this relationship, you will have to face a great obstacle.
There is more to our fortunes, right?
Are not you going to tell us more?
It is not our turn yet, eh?
I saw Mr. Third Rate hurrying off somewhere just now.
Does it really bother you that much?
He might be waiting for his situation to turn around.
If Mr. Third Rate were to hit the comeback homerun...
So we were that incompatible with each other eh...
You are not that easily influenced by fortune-telling, are you?
So that is the reason why you are so cold towards only me...
No, that is'because you are a perverted alien-
I am sure you are calling me that'because of our incompatibility, right?
We are not allowed to be together, huh...
So are you going to leave me just because of this?
Damn those guys from the sports clubs!
I will make them pay this time!
So are you going to leave me just because of this?
N-Nothing, you have just completely changed...
You are a great help, Shintani.
She was so cute that I thought I would die!
Will not it be faster to use this?
It might be long enough to get the whole entrance.
Press here, just like this, and it will-
Did you connect the hose properly?!
Do not block the water with your hands!
Which direction should I turn it?!
Do not use your hands to block it!
What are you doing on this chilly day?
You are going to catch a cold if you do not change.
I will not stop you if you insist on playing in the water, though.
Shintani, do you have clothes to change into?
You are going to catch a cold.
I will go to the infirmary and take care of this.
You are going there like that?
Yeah, the corridors would get wet, so I will walk around the building to the infirmary.
That is not what I mean.
Not like you can see through my underwear.
Why do you think that guy over there is blushing?
It is not good to be so clueless, Prez.
I will strip completely if you do not wear it.
I mean, if you are fine with me dancing stark naked at the school gates...
Just do not go stripping, you pervert!
Nothing, just felt like doing it.
Why do not you try meowing?
What are you trying to pull?!
Yeah, she might have one already, do not you think?
Especially if she is as cute as you say.
Well, no worries if she is a fugly pig, though.
Then she must have a boyfriend by now!
You honestly never thought about that possibility?
We are going to be high schoolers soon, you know?
For the city girls, even for the middle schoolers, they must have...
To be a high school girl, I am sure they have to have done this or that...
Try reading this book I found in my big sister's room.
The high school girls were playing around with a guy's body, you know?
Misaki would not do things like that!
She is a pure, cute, and kind person!
Hey, do not tease an idealistic middle school boy!
Still, do not you think that he needs to start seeing things more realistically?
Well, he does worry others sometimes.
He still has the candy wrapper that girl gave him, right?
He put that wrapper into the victory charm we bought together for the baseball team.
So you were the reason we lost our second round in the summer league?!
It was the reason why we won our first round!
Are you really serious about finding her in high school?
You are going to be disappointed if you expect too much from her.
Be prepared if you are going to try to find her.
I will worry about getting her annoyed when it happens, and just keep trying.
Were you waiting a long time for me?
I heard Yumesaki High's Cultural Festival is amazing!
I was just about to film the lakeside scene that we did not get to do last time.
We were all in the same boat, eh...
You are really going to do that?
The fireworks have been going off non-stop, so we will cover up the audio later.
I will leave this to you!
I heard rumors, but to think that it is this grand...
Seems like it is their school's tradition.
I heard they have spent half a year preparing for this.
It is really noisy over there.
Hey you are in the way!
Have not I said it before?
Be nice if you want me to like you.
Only those who can promise me that can follow me.
So both of you were swept up to the first few rows?
Beyond this sea of people, right?
Seems like they were lining up for the performance,
and Sakura does not want to move now.
I do not want to move!
I do not want to go further away from the stage!
I guess we will not be able to meet up with you guys,
so go ahead and enjoy yourselves!
The band has a different feel about them, too!
It feels like there is a gap between them and their fans.
But scandals involving the fans have faded away.
This is a good thing for their fans who are looking forward to their music.
Kuuga certainly seemed different, like Sakura said.
Although I am still not sure if he is trustworthy.
But I guess a person's opinions differ when seen from different angles.
There is no use thinking about it now, huh?
Shall we go and enjoy the festival?
I still feel like I am being led around by Usui...
Never mind that, shall we enjoy ourselves?
Let us enjoy Yumesaki's Festival, since we are already here!
Now you are switching to the spoilt brat tone!
You are annoying, so go be with Shizuko and Sakura!
When is KameMushi's live performance ending?!
I hope Kuuga will sing his new song!
Oh yeah, should not you tell everyone that next episode's the last one?
Then I should do something befitting of the last episode.
I want to see your true self.
